message: Hi Bob, I'm offering you my product for $9,500.  It's in excellent condition and worth every penny.  Let me know what you think!
Hello Alice, thank you for your offer. I appreciate the value of the product, but I am only willing to pay $8,000 for it. Please let me know if this is acceptable.

Hi Bob, I appreciate your offer, but $8,000 is a bit too low for me.  I'm willing to come down to $9,000.  That's still a great deal for you considering the value of the product.  Let me know if you're interested.

Hello Alice, I understand your position, but I believe we can reach an agreement closer to my previous offer. I am willing to pay $8,500 for the product. This is still within my budget and represents a fair compromise. I hope you'll consider this proposal.
